channel.title: CVE Feed for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Active Management Technology
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Intel Corporation -- Intel(R) Active Management Technology

item.title: CVE-2018-3657|2024-09-16T20:01:21.908Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Multiple buffer overflows in Intel AMT in Intel CSME firmware versions before version 12.0.5 may allow a privileged user to potentially execute arbitrary code with Intel AMT execution privilege via local access.

item.title: CVE-2018-3616|2024-09-16T16:53:35.507Z -- intel%20corporation -- intel%28r%29%20active%20management%20technology
item.description: Bleichenbacher-style side channel vulnerability in TLS implementation in Intel Active Management Technology before 12.0.5 may allow an unauthenticated user to potentially obtain the TLS session key via the network.
